sentences.english: The snake that adorned her headdress was an emblem of kingship.
sentences.chinese: 她頭上的蛇形裝飾代表着王權。

sentences.english: The Serpentine: Serpentines make excellent exercises for suppling the sides on the horse.
sentences.chinese: 蛇形型路線，是很好的練習，幫助馬匹柔軟。

sentences.english: In this paper, GPS technology is applied to navigation of a snake-like robot.
sentences.chinese: 將GPS技術應用於蛇形機器人自主運動控制。

sentences.english: At night, the straw bales are dried by the hot air through the snakelike air duct.
sentences.chinese: 夜間通過蛇形風管，用熱風乾燥草捆。

sentences.english: Do you know how to do the snake or the half-moon?
sentences.chinese: 您知道如何做蛇形或半月形嗎？

sentences.english: The dynamics of the new snake-like robot is mainly studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 重點研究了該蛇形機器人的動力學。

sentences.english: A novel model of snake-like robot based on a spatial linkage mechanism is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於空間連桿機構的蛇形機器人模型。

definition: to join head to tail/bumper-to-bumper (of traffic jam)
legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
